metadata.title: AI-Enhanced ML-FAANG Mastery Plan
metadata.description: 20-week comprehensive roadmap for ML researchers transitioning to FAANG software engineering roles with AI-powered learning assistance

week.title: Portfolio Showcase + Technical Leadership Demonstration
objectives: Consolidate and showcase all technical projects in a professional portfolio
Master the art of presenting technical work and demonstrating leadership
Address complex, multi-domain system design challenges
Perfect communication and influence skills for senior-level interviews

morning_session.title: Portfolio Architecture & Leadership
activities: Portfolio architecture optimization with AI-guided project structure enhancement
AI explanation of technical leadership demonstration and influence optimization
Innovation showcase preparation with AI narrative development

problems.name: Design Phone Directory
problems.description: System design with efficient resource management
problems.ai_prompt: How does resource allocation design relate to computational resource management in distributed ML training systems?

problems.name: Find Median from Data Stream
problems.description: Real-time statistics with balanced data structures
problems.ai_prompt: How does streaming statistics relate to online learning and real-time model performance monitoring?

problems.name: Design Tic-Tac-Toe
problems.description: Game engine design with optimal win detection
problems.ai_prompt: How does game state management relate to reinforcement learning environments and decision trees?

problems.name: Maximum Subarray
problems.description: Kadane's algorithm for maximum subarray sum
problems.ai_prompt: How does Kadane's algorithm relate to dynamic programming in RL?

problems.name: Jump Game
problems.description: Greedy approach to determine if end is reachable
problems.ai_prompt: How does reachability analysis relate to goal planning in RL?

evening_session.title: Portfolio Project Showcase
activities: Portfolio Project #1: Complete advanced ML system design showcase
Leadership Study: Technical leadership patterns at FAANG companies
Plan comprehensive portfolio optimization with AI enhancement

morning_session.title: Technical Presentation Mastery
activities: Technical presentation mastery with AI-enhanced communication coaching
AI explanation of audience engagement and technical storytelling optimization
Visual communication and whiteboard mastery with AI clarity coaching

problems.name: The Skyline Problem
problems.description: Complex geometric problem with sweep line algorithm
problems.ai_prompt: How does event-based processing relate to temporal pattern recognition and time-series analysis in ML?

problems.name: Design In-Memory File System
problems.description: Complex system design with hierarchical structure
problems.ai_prompt: How does hierarchical storage design relate to model versioning and artifact management in MLOps?

problems.name: Smallest Range Covering Elements from K Lists
problems.ai_prompt: How does multi-source range optimization relate to ensemble model selection and multi-objective optimization?

evening_session.title: Portfolio Project Presentation
activities: Portfolio Project #2: Advanced AI-ML integration showcase
Practice technical presentations with AI real-time feedback and optimization
Advanced SQL: Portfolio analytics and performance measurement queries

morning_session.title: Innovation Demonstration
activities: Innovation showcase with AI-guided breakthrough project development
AI explanation of system architecture excellence and scalability demonstration
Cross-functional impact demonstration with AI optimization coaching

problems.name: Basic Calculator III
problems.ai_prompt: How does expression evaluation relate to computational graph construction and automatic differentiation?

problems.name: Remove Invalid Parentheses
problems.description: BFS with state pruning and optimization
problems.ai_prompt: How does constraint satisfaction relate to hyperparameter validation and model architecture search?

evening_session.title: Innovation Showcase
activities: Portfolio Project #3: Innovation showcase with breakthrough ML applications
Industry Study: Innovation patterns and technical leadership at top companies
Advanced architecture optimization with AI strategic guidance

morning_session.title: Impact Measurement & Validation
activities: Impact measurement and quantification with AI-guided metrics optimization
AI explanation of technical excellence validation and quality assurance
Portfolio completion checklist with AI comprehensive assessment

problems.name: Portfolio Optimization Task
problems.description: Complete technical project optimization with AI enhancement
problems.ai_prompt: How can you quantify the impact of your projects? Use AI to help define metrics for success and performance improvements.

problems.name: Quality Validation Task
problems.description: Comprehensive code review and performance optimization
problems.ai_prompt: Use AI code review tools to identify potential bugs, style inconsistencies, and performance bottlenecks in your portfolio projects.

evening_session.title: Impact Demonstration
activities: Portfolio Project #4: Impact demonstration with measurable achievements
Study portfolio presentation techniques and optimization strategies
Plan final portfolio presentation with AI comprehensive enhancement

morning_session.title: Presentation Mastery
activities: Portfolio presentation mastery with AI-guided storytelling optimization
AI explanation of technical excellence communication and impact articulation
Final portfolio optimization with AI comprehensive enhancement

problems.name: Presentation Challenge
problems.description: Technical communication with AI real-time optimization
problems.ai_prompt: Practice presenting one of your portfolio projects to an AI interviewer. Get feedback on your clarity, confidence, and ability to handle questions.

problems.name: Excellence Validation Task
problems.description: Portfolio quality assessment with AI standards verification
problems.ai_prompt: Do a final pass on all your portfolio materials (code, READMEs, design docs) with AI assistance to ensure they meet FAANG-level quality standards.

evening_session.title: Final Portfolio Presentation
activities: Final Portfolio Presentation: Complete showcase with AI optimization
AI analysis of portfolio excellence and presentation impact
Weekend planning for final optimization and interview mastery

saturday.title: Portfolio Project: Real-Time Feature Store Infrastructure
saturday.description: Build a production-grade real-time feature store system using advanced data structures for serving ML features at ultra-low latency. The system will handle millions of feature requests per second with millisecond response times.

problems.name: Insert Delete GetRandom O(1)
problems.description: Design data structure with O(1) operations

problems.name: All O`one Data Structure
problems.description: Complex data structure with multiple O(1) requirements

problems.name: Design Underground System
problems.description: Real-time analytics system with efficient data structures

tasks: Implement high-performance feature serving using custom hash tables with consistent hashing.
Create multi-level caching system using LRU and TTL policies for feature freshness management.
Build real-time feature computation pipeline using streaming data structures and incremental updates.
Design horizontal scaling architecture with automatic failover and data replication.
saturday.deliverable: A scalable feature store platform with REST/gRPC APIs, monitoring dashboard, and comprehensive benchmarking suite.

sunday.title: ML System Study: Uber's Real-Time ML Platform
sunday.description: Deep dive into Uber's real-time ML infrastructure including Michelangelo ML platform, focusing on how advanced data structures enable real-time prediction serving for ride matching, pricing, and ETA prediction.

problems.name: Design Add and Search Words Data Structure
problems.description: Trie-based data structure with pattern matching

problems.name: Snapshot Array
problems.description: Versioned data structure with efficient storage

tasks: Study Uber's Michelangelo platform architecture and how it serves real-time ML predictions.
Analyze geospatial data structures used for efficient driver-rider matching and route optimization.
Research dynamic pricing algorithms and how they use real-time feature stores for demand prediction.
Implement a mini ride-matching system using advanced data structures from your feature store project.
sunday.deliverable: Technical analysis of Uber's ML platform with working prototype of real-time prediction serving system.
